name: api_rendering_RenderTexture
description: Render textures are textures that can be rendered to.

properties.name: antiAliasing
properties.description: The antialiasing level for the RenderTexture.

properties.name: autoGenerateMips
properties.description: Mipmap levels are generated automatically when this flag is set.

properties.name: bindTextureMS
properties.description: If true and antiAliasing is greater than 1, the render texture will not be resolved by default. Use this if the render texture needs to be bound as a multisampled texture in a shader.

properties.name: colorBuffer
properties.description: Color buffer of the render texture (Read Only).

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The precision of the render texture's depth buffer in bits (0, 16, 24 and 32 are supported).

properties.name: depthBuffer
properties.description: Depth/stencil buffer of the render texture (Read Only).

properties.name: depthStencilFormat
properties.description: The format of the depth/stencil buffer.

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description: This struct contains all the information required to create a RenderTexture. It can be copied, cached, and reused to easily create RenderTextures that all share the same properties.

properties.name: dimension
properties.description: Dimensionality (type) of the render texture.

properties.name: enableRandomWrite
properties.description: Enable random access write into this render texture on Shader Model 5.0 level shaders.

properties.name: enableShadingRate
properties.description: Make this render texture usable as a shading rate image.

properties.name: graphicsFormat
properties.description: The color format of the render texture. You can set the color format to None to achieve depth-only rendering.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the render texture in pixels.

properties.name: memorylessMode
properties.description: The render texture memoryless mode property.

properties.name: sRGB
properties.description: Does this render texture use sRGB read/write conversions? (Read Only).

properties.name: stencilFormat
properties.description: The format of the stencil data that you can encapsulate within a RenderTexture.Specifying this property creates a stencil element for the RenderTexture and sets its format. This allows for stencil data to be bound as a Texture to all shader types for the platforms that support it. This property does not specify the format of the stencil buffer, which is constrained by the depth buffer format specified in RenderTexture.depth.Currently, most platforms only support R8_UInt (DirectX11, DirectX12), while PS4 also supports R8_UNorm.

properties.name: useDynamicScale
properties.description: When this flag is set to true, render texture is set to be used by the Dynamic Resolution system.

properties.name: useDynamicScaleExplicit
properties.description: When this flag is set to true, render texture is set to be used by the Dynamic Resolution system. Scale is applied with an explicit call to ApplyDynamicScale

properties.name: useMipMap
properties.description: Render texture has mipmaps when this flag is set.

properties.name: volumeDepth
properties.description: Volume extent of a 3D render texture or number of slices of array texture.
